name: Veggie Buddies
description:
You play as the two best Veggie Buddies you could ever imagine. Karl der Kürbis (Karl the Pumpkin) and Gudrun die Gurke (Gudrun the Cucumber). The goal is to reach the end of each level.

Playing on MacOS Instructions - Read carefully

1. Download the given BuildMacOs.app.zip

2. Unzip the zip, you should now have a BuildMacOs.app If you cannot execute it or are getting an error, continue:

3. Open a terminal in the same directoy as the BuildMacOs.app

4. Copy, paste and execute this command:
chmod +x BuildMacOs.app/Contents/MacOS/GGJ2022Game

5. Copy, paste and execute this command
xattr -r -d com.apple.quarantine BuildMacOs.app/

I don't know why this is happening, but I am investigating. This is a workaround provided in the official Unity Forums: https://forum.unity.com/threads/issue-opening-unity-mac-applications-on-mac-big-...

Controls on Keyboard

A/D - Go left/right
Space - Jump
Esc - Quit Application
Shift - Shooting/Slashing

Controls on Gamepad

D-Stick - Go left/right
A/Cross - Jump
Select - Quit Application
B/Circle - Shooting/Slashing
